String.string: It's an emergency recall order. Report to Baruch in Tulufan.
Go back to Velika and speak with Troius at the pegasus platform.
Report to Adjutant Uriela in front of the Valkyon Federation Headquarters in Velika.
Go to Commander Seir at Valkyon Federation Headquarters in Velika.
Go to Elleon waiting in front of the goddess's statue near Velik's Stairs in Velika.
